required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: AZD0585 Phase III Long-term Study in Japan
clinical_study.official_title: A Randomised, Double-blind, Placebo Controlled, Parallel Group, Phase III Long-term Study to Evaluate Efficacy and Safety of 12 Weeks and 52 Weeks of AZD0585 Administration, Respectively, in Japanese Patients With Hyperlipidemia Accompanied by Hypertriglyceridemia.

brief_summary.textblock: This study is a randomised, double-blind phase III long-term study to evaluate efficacy and safety of 12 weeks and 52 weeks of AZD0585 administration compared to placebo in patients with hyperlipidemia accompanied by hypertriglyceridemia .

primary_outcome.measure: Efficacy of AZD0585 by Assessment of Percent Change in Serum Triglycerides
primary_outcome.description: To demonstrate the efficacy of AZD0585 2 g and 4 g compared to placebo (corn oil) in Japanese patients with hypertriglyceridemia.

primary_outcome.measure: Safety of AZD0585 by Assessment of Adverse Events in Patients
primary_outcome.description: To evaluate the long-term (up to 52 weeks) safety of AZD0585 in Japanese patients with hypertriglyceridemia.

secondary_outcome.measure: Efficacy of AZD0585 by Assessment of Percent Change in Serum Lipid Profile
secondary_outcome.description: To assess the efficacy of AZD0585 2 g and 4 g compared to placebo (corn oil). The serum lipid profile includes total cholesterol, High-density lipoprotein cholesterol, Low-density lipoprotein cholesterol,Very low-density lipoprotein cholesterol and Non-high-density lipoprotein cholesterol.

secondary_outcome.measure: Efficacy of AZD0585 by Assessment of Percent Changes in Plasma Fatty Acids Profile.
secondary_outcome.description: To assess the efficacy of AZD0585 2 g and 4 g compared to placebo (corn oil) . The plasma fatty acids profile includes eicosapentaenoic acid, docosahexaenoic acid, arachidonic acid and eicosapentaenoic acid per arachidonic acid rate.

secondary_outcome.measure: Efficacy of AZD0585 by Assessment of Percent Changes in Apolipoproteins Profile
secondary_outcome.description: To assess the efficacy of AZD0585 2 g and 4 g compared to placebo (corn oil) . Apolipoproteins include Apolipoprotein A-I, Apolipoprotein A-II, Apolipoprotein B, Apolipoprotein B48, Apolipoprotein C-II, Apolipoprotein C-III and Apolipoprotein E.

secondary_outcome.measure: Efficacy of AZD0585 by Assessment of Percent Changes in Small Dense LDL and LDL-C/Apo B Ratio
secondary_outcome.description: To assess the efficacy of AZD0585 2 g and 4 g compared to placebo (corn oil).

secondary_outcome.measure: Efficacy of AZD0585 by Assessment of Percent Changes in Lp(a), RLP-C, PCSK9, and Hs-CRP
secondary_outcome.description: To assess the efficacy of AZD0585 2 g and 4 g compared to placebo (corn oil).

arm_group.description: AZD0585 1g × 2 capsules and AZD0585 placebo 1g × 2 capsules once daily

criteria.textblock:
Key Inclusion Criteria:
- Japanese men or women, ≥20 years of age.
- Subjects must meet all of the following criteria;
1. Fasting triglyceride level: average of Visit 2 and Visit 3 must be in the range 150 - 499 mg/dL
2. %TG change between Visit 2 and Visit 3 must be within 30%
3. %LDL-C change between Visit 2 and Visit 3 must be within 25%
Key Exclusion Criteria:
- Allergy or intolerance to omega-3 fatty acids and omega-3-acid ethyl esters.
- Known lipoprotein lipase impairment or deficiency, or Apolipoprotein C-II deficiency or familial dysbetalipoproteinemia.
- Current or history of pancreatitis.
- Type I diabetes mellitus, use of insulin, or haemoglobin A1c >10% at Visit 1.

overall_official.affiliation: Social medial corporation Koyokai Nakajima Hospital

participant_flow.recruitment_details: This study was conducted in 26 sites in Japan between 10 June 2015 and 08 March 2017.
participant_flow.pre_assignment_details: The study duration was up to 60 weeks, consisting of an initial screening period of 8 weeks and a 52-week treatment period.

group.title: AZD0585 2g Group
group.description: AZD0585 1g × 2 capsules and AZD0585 placebo 1g × 2 capsules once daily

baseline.population: Full Analysis Set included all randomized subjects who had both baseline and any post-baseline efficacy measurements. 1 subject in Placebo group was excluded due to missing post-baseline measurements.

group.title: AZD0585 2g Group
group.description: AZD0585 1g × 2 capsules and AZD0585 placebo 1g × 2 capsules once daily

outcome.description: To demonstrate the efficacy of AZD0585 2 g and 4 g compared to placebo (corn oil) in Japanese patients with hypertriglyceridemia.
outcome.population: The Full Analysis Set included all randomized patients who had both any baseline and any post-baseline efficacy measurements.

measure.population: The Full Analysis Set included all randomized patients who had both any baseline and any post-baseline efficacy measurements.

analysis.method_desc: Baseline TG and statin usage were included as covariates.
Baseline TG and statin usage were included as covariates.

outcome.title: Safety of AZD0585 by Assessment of Adverse Events in Patients
outcome.description: To evaluate the long-term (up to 52 weeks) safety of AZD0585 in Japanese patients with hypertriglyceridemia.
outcome.population: The Safety Analysis Set included all patients who took at least 1 dose of double-blind investigational product.

reported_events.time_frame: AEs, brief physical findings/clinical assessments, laboratory measurements, vital signs ,and ECGs were assessed throughout the 52-treatment period.

category.title: Neoplasms benign, malignant and unspecified (incl cysts and polyps)

certain_agreements.pi_employee: Principal Investigators are NOT employed by the organization sponsoring the study.
certain_agreements.restrictive_agreement: There is NOT an agreement between Principal Investigators and the Sponsor (or its agents) that restricts the PI's rights to discuss or publish trial results after the trial is completed.
